mapper.select: SELECT * FROM recruitments ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT r.id, r.club_id as clubId, r.title, r.content, r.writer, r.address, r.max_user as maxUser, r.created_at, r.meeting_date as meetingDate FROM recruitments r WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM club_members cm WHERE cm.club_id = r.club_id AND cm.user_id = #{userId} ) ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruitments ( club_id, title, content, writer, address, max_user, created_at, meeting_date ) VALUES ( #{clubId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{address}, #{maxUser}, NOW(), #{meetingDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, club_id as clubId, title, content, writer, address, max_user as maxUser, created_at, meeting_date as meetingDate FROM recruitments WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruitment_member (recruitment_id, user_id, joined_at) VALUES ( #{recruitmentId}, #{userId}, NOW() )
